query: 'SELECT
    Product_ID,
    Product_Name,
    Category_ID,
    
    CASE
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 103) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 103)  -- DD/MM/YYYY
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 101) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 101)  -- MM/DD/YYYY
        WHEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 120) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 120)  -- YYYY-MM-DD
        ELSE NULL
    END AS Launch_Date,
    TRY_CAST(Price AS INT) AS Price,
    notes
FROM [bronze].[products]
WHERE Product_ID IS NOT NULL
  AND Product_Name IS NOT NULL
  AND Category_ID IS NOT NULL
  AND notes IS NOT NULL
  AND TRY_CAST(Price AS INT) IS NOT NULL
  AND Price <> '1'
  AND Price NOT LIKE '%$%'
  AND (
       TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 103) IS NOT NULL
    OR TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 101) IS NOT NULL
    OR TRY_CONVERT(date, Launch_Date, 120) IS NOT NULL
  )',
